div.h2: Sr. Software Engineer, App Store Engineering

li.title: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: App Store Engineering R&D team is looking for talented software engineers to break new ground on our App delivery platform. At Apple, great ideas have a way of quickly becoming great products, services and customer experiences. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no end to what you can accomplish.

ul.li: Extensive experience with Java or equivalent object-oriented languages
5+ years designing, implementing and supporting highly scalable backend applications
Deep understanding of HTTP and REST APIs
Ability to design and establish coding patterns/standards across multiple code repositories
Mentor team members on writing code that is efficient, maintainable and testable
Ability to re-architect an expansive code base while transitioning to new technologies/frameworks
Experience with NoSQL & big data technologies like Cassandra, Solr, Kafka and Hadoop
Solid grasp of multi-threaded programming concepts
Ability to thrive on highly collaborative, cross-functional projects that are high profile and critical to the App Store

div.p:
The iTunes Connect team is looking for a Senior Software Engineer to design and build features driving the App Store and TestFlight.
We are looking for a self-starter who is energetic and not afraid to question assumptions. Excellent written and oral skills are a must. The candidate should have experience developing large-scale, server-side systems using object-oriented languages. We are looking an excellent team player who is able to tackle problems under tight deadlines and deliver imaginative solutions.
